c74object.name: abc.simpleburstfm~
c74object.digest: Abclib's simple and short (110 ms) FM Synthesis
c74object.description: abc.simpleburstfm~ is an abstraction that generates a short (110 milliseconds) FM synthetized sound (carrier at 440 Hz, modulator at 220 Hz, modulation index equals 5). There is no default value in the bpatcher.
